item.description: Dear fellow Patriot, On December 16th, 1773, American colonists dumped tea into the Boston Harbor to protest an oppressive tax. This was one of first acts of the patriots that sparked the American Revolution that brought about our great country. There is a new REVOLUTION going on. This REVOLUTION has inspired millions of Americans to come together and unite behind a message of freedom and fiscal responsibility. This message is embodied in the Presidential Campaign of Congressman Ron Paul. We have seen its spark in 2007. We have seen its first fruits in 2010. Now we are aiming for the top. Join us on December 16th, 2011 for the Tea Party Moneybomb, as we dump millions of dollars into the Ron Paul presidential campaign to Restore America Now. Our goal is to bring together 65,000 patriots to donate $100 each, creating a one day donation total of $6,500,000. PLEDGE HERE: http://www.teaparty11... DONATE HERE: http://www.ronpaul201...
item.name: Tea Party '11 Moneybomb
